Package ca.gkelly.engine.graphics

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.gkelly.engine.graphics.Camera
  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    2D world-space camera, allows translation and zoom
    To use place all draw calls between begin() and finish()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Camera​(java.awt.Container window, TileMap map)
      Create a new Camera

      • Camera

        Parameters:

        map - The TileMap that will be used as the background

      • worldSpace

        public int[] worldSpace​(int x,
                        int y)
        Project a pair of coordinates to World space
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate, in screen space
        y - The y coordinate, in screen space
        Returns:
        The coordinates, in world space

      • screenSpace

        public int[] screenSpace​(int x,
                         int y)
        Unproject a pair of coordinates to window space
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate, in world space
        y - The y coordinate, in world space
        Returns:
        The coordinates, in screen space
